1223130.name: Bug Academy - Artistic Kit
1223130.description:
30-minute Bug Academy Original Soundtrack, created by Maciej Olewniczak, played personally by our insect students on their tiny instruments. Additionally, 5 digital, high resolution wallpapers, with flies, fireflies, mosquitoes, bees and cows.

Soundtrack and wallpapers will be placed in the game catalog:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Bug Academy\Bug Academy - Artistic Kit

Track listing:
1. Bug Academy - 1:46
2. Kindergarten - 1.43
3. Forest - 1:36
4. City - 2:12
5. Tower - 1:49
6. Castle - 1:36
7. Race - 1:44
8. Spring - 2:21
9. Night - 1:22
10. Caves - 1:36
11. Heist - 1:30
12. Fire - 2:22
13. Rocket - 2:16
14. Space - 2:03
15. Lobby - 1:48
16. Muchy - 0:19
1223130.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 俄语*, 简体中文*, 土耳其语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
